=====
Usage
=====

To use pattern_analysis in a project:

.. code-block:: python
    import pattern_analysis


To quantify the occurences of a specified pattern in a sequence:

.. code-block:: python

    from pattern_analysis import pattern_analysis
    ori = ""
    pat = "TGATCA"
    res = pattern_analysis.pattern_count(ori, pat)
    print("A total of {} {} are found.".format(res, pat))
